How connected do you feel with the Columbia community?

10: Extremely connected

Not connected at all: 0

Average answer:

4.6

Breakdown of answers by living situation in the last 18 months

Each segment represents 10 percent of the respondents in the category

32.5% of respondents did not feel

very connected to the Columbia

community

Lived only at primary place of residence

20.4% of respondents

felt very connected

47.1% of respondents felt neutral

Those who lived only away

from their primary place

of residence felt the most

disconnected from the

Columbia community
